hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 114 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
leave no stone unturned
let's find out what it means and how you
can use it in your daily conversation to
leave no stone unturned when you are
determined to achieve something you go
all out of your way to make sure that
you achieve it the idiom to leave no
stone unturned basically means to make
every possible effort to accomplish
something you use every resource and try
every course of action to get what you
want you look everywhere turn over every
rock to get what you want by doing
everything in your power for example if
you are going to a fancy dress
competition you go around looking for
the best possible costume to suit the
character you are playing you buy the
best accessories and hire the best
makeup artists in your town you have a
dress rehearsal before the competition
this means you do everything to win the
competition
so you leave no stone unturned okay now
that you know what this idiom means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how to use it in your
daily conversation example 1 know daniel
was tired he left no stone unturned in
researching for his project example kill
the team of surgeons left no stone
unturned in reviving the patient during
the surgery example 3 for their wedding
anniversary William left no stone
unturned to surprise his wife with a
candle light dinner at the beach
example for when she failed in her exams
Teresa regretted it and wished that she
had left no stone unturned in her exam
preparations example 5 being a model
Leni leaves no stone unturned to stay
slim she exercises and eats salad daily
example 6 the wedding planners had left
no stone unturned in arranging the
wedding ceremony example 7 the firemen
used all their resources and left no
stone unturned to extinguish the house
that was on fire
example 8 the dance troupe practiced all
day long and left no stone unturned to
perfect their dance steps example 9 most
women leave no stone unturned to look
younger by spending a huge amount of
money on advanced beauty treatments
example 10 the swimming coach left no
stone unturned in preparing his students
for the swimming competition that's the
end of today's episode to achieve
something in your life have you ever
